other_title: Ghost in the Shell: Arise - Alternative Architecture
攻殻機動隊 ARISE ALTERNATIVE ARCHITECTURE
opening_theme: "Anata wo Tamotsu Mono (あなたを保つもの)" by Maaya Sakamoto x Cornelius
ending_theme: #1: "Split Spirit" by Yukihiro Takahashi & METAFIVE (Keigo Oyamada × Yoshinori Sunahara × Towa Tei × Tomohiko Kondou × Leo Imai) [高橋幸宏 & METAFIVE (小山田圭吾×砂原良徳×TOWA TEI×ゴンドウトモヒコ×LEO今井)] (eps 1-2)
#2: "Jibun ga Inai (じぶんがいない)" by salyu× salyu (サリュバイサリュ) (eps 3-4)
#3: "Soto wa Senjou da yo (外は戦場だよ)" by Ichiko Aoba (青葉市子) (eps 5-6)
#4: "Heart Grenade" by Sean Lennon and Cornelius (eps 7-8)
#5:  "Ghost in the Shell Arise" by Cornelius (eps 9-10)
